panel.title: Dashboards with Concurrency Issues

search.query: index=_internal (sourcetype=splunkd OR sourcetype=scheduler) "The maximum number of concurrent" host=$host|s$ (provenance=UI:Dashboard:*) | rex field=id "(?<ssuser>[^_]+)__" | eval user = coalesce(user, username, ssuser), search_id = coalesce(savedsearch_id, id, "null") | stats dc(search_id) as total_occurrences values(reason) as reason values(search_id) as search_ids by user provenance | rex field=provenance "UI:[d|D]ashboard:(?<dashboard>.*)"|join dashboard [|rest splunk_server=$host$ servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views f=disabled f=eai:* f=isVisible f=isDashboard f=rootNode f=title f=version|fields title eai:acl.app isDashboard|stats values(*) as * by title eai:acl.app|rename title as dashboard eai:acl.app as app|search isDashboard=1 app=$app$|fields - isDashboard]|fields - dashboard|sort 0 - total_occurrences

panel.title: Dashboards for Post Processing

search.query: | rest splunk_server=$host|s$ servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views f=eai:data f=title f=eai:appName | fields title eai:appName eai:data splunk_server author | search eai:data="*<search*" eai:appName =$app$ | xpath outfield=base_id "//search/@id" field=eai:data | xpath outfield=query "//query" field=eai:data | rex field=query "\|?(?<generating_spl>[^\|]+)(\||.*)" | eval total_query=mvcount(generating_spl) | eval dc_query=mvdedup(generating_spl) | eval distinct_query=mvcount(dc_query) | stats values(total_query) as total_query values(distinct_query) as query_count values(base_id) as base_id list(generating_spl) as generating_spl by title eai:appName author | where total_query!=query_count | rename eai:appName as app|sort 0 - total_query|where isnull(base_id)|fields - base_id

panel.html:
Displays generating searches in dashboards to find dashboards that will benefit from base searches.
Optional: remove | where total_query!=query_count from search to show other dashboards that might be candidates for base searches. Some generating searches are similar enough that base searches will work with some SPL changes.
Optional: use |where isnotnull(base_id) instead to find dashboards already using base searches
